## Concomitant Medications

### gt

```{r, comment=NA}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(gt)

data("cadcm", package = "random.cdisc.data")
gt_adcm <- cadcm %>%
  select(USUBJID, CMDECOD, TRT01A)

gt_adcm %>% gt()

tab <-
  gt_adcm %>%
  gt(
    rowname_col = "row",
    groupname_col = "group"
  ) %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Conmed Example",
    subtitle = md("Uses the *adcm* dataset from **random.cdisc.data**")
  )
tab

```
